channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How deep sleep clears a mouse's mind, literally

item.title: Discovery of 'Punk' and 'Emo' fossils challenges our understanding of ancient molluscs
item.description: Researchers have unearthed two fossils, named Punk and Emo, revealing that ancient molluscs were more complex and adaptable than previously known.
